Home.aboutText: With years of experience, I design intuitive and customized web interfaces. Constantly exploring new technologies and trends, I ensure my projects are always up-to-date and aligned with users' needs.
Home.contactTitle: Ready to discuss your next project?
Home.contactText: Interested in discussing an opportunity to create something amazing? I'm available.

Projects.tapdano: As part of the Blueshift team, I was assigned to code the TapDano website based on an already created design.
Projects.wattwise: Energy Dashboard, a project created for Global Solution at FIAP, in the second semester of the first year.
Projects.bikehub: Fictional eCommerce of a bicycle shop. Its initial concept was based on the prospecting of a real client.

Contact.subject: Let's have a chat!
Contact.body: Hi, Edvan! I saw your portfolio and have a few ideas in mind. If you have some time, let's chat?
